DOC.brief_summary: - Hypothesis : - X-tip intraosseous effective supplementary injection mandibular hot teeth well Periodontal Ligament ( PDL ) injection - Purposes : - Comparing anesthetic efficacy X-tip intraosseous PDL injection mandibular hot teeth anesthetize 3.6 ml Infra Alveolar Nerve Block - Methods Materials : - forty patient mandibular hot molar second premolar anesthetize 3.6 ml inferior alveolar nerve block injection select study
DOC.detailed_description: - Randomization : - All patient randomly divide two group follow : 1 . X-tip intraosseous injection use supplementary 2 . PDL injection use supplementary - Anesthetic evaluation : - For anesthetic evaluation use Visual Analog Scale ( VAS )
DOC.criteria: Mandibular Molars second premolar Acute Irreversible Pulpitis None teeth select anesthetized follow 3.6 ml Lidocaine block injection Unhealthy patient Teeth anesthetize follow 3.6 ml nerve block injection Patients sign lip anesthesia follow 3.6 ml injection
